name: Dharma Dog
overview:
Dharma Dog will take care of your puppy like it is our own!  At the Dharma Dog facility the dogs come first, and they take pride in themselves on maintaining a safe and worry-free environment for all Dharma Dog pooches.

Whether it’s the calming themes, the music playing within the facility, the rubber flooring in the play area, or the adventure walks to the outdoor fun area.

Dharma Dog has services such as canine daycare, dog grooming and pooch walking. Your pup will get ample play, affection and relaxation, all while under the watchful eye of our expertly trained and caring pooch handlers.

Dharma Dog rates are competitively priced such as for a single dog $5.99 hourly rate, and if you have two dogs $35.99 half day. We also have Dog Walking that comes in two packages either privately, or with a group. Small group walk rates are $10 for 30 minutes or a private walk at $15 for 30 minutes. We know that sometimes Dog Grooming can be an adventure for the owner, however we have alternatives to doing it yourself such as a  basic grooming with full style and hair trim starting at $49.99.
